john.j:about: I began my career working for the Ministry of Defense, in the department of Maritime Affairs, based first in Rotterdam (Netherlands), then in Cap Town (South Africa). I joined Acme in 1988 as head of the commercial department. After being involved in a number of construction projects, I took charge of the Russian subsidiary in 1997. I'm Senior Vice President, Constructions of Acme since my nomination in 2002.
